languages.text: {n}Иокаста с азартом кивает.{/n} "Если преступник спешил скрыть следы, то впопыхах мог не успеть избавиться от замаранной одежды".
{n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста с азартом кивает.{/n} "Если преступник спешил скрыть следы, то впопыхах мог не успеть избавиться от замаранной одежды".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta nods excitedly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to get rid of the soiled clothing in a hurry."
{n}Jocasta nods excitedly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to get rid of the soiled clothing in a hurry."
{n}Jocasta nods excitedly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dump the soiled clothing."

{n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."

{n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback nickt ernst.{/n} "Wenn es der Täter eilig hatte, seine Spuren zu verwischen, hatte er möglicherweise keine Zeit, seine schmutzige Kleidung zu entsorgen."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback nickt ernst.{/n} "Wenn es der Täter eilig hatte, seine Spuren zu verwischen, hatte er möglicherweise keine Zeit, seine schmutzige Kleidung zu entsorgen.

languages.text: {n}Sauerback acquiesce.{/n} « Si le coupable s'est dépêché de couvrir ses traces, il n'a peut-être pas eu le temps de se débarrasser de ses vêtements souillés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback acquiesce.{/n} « Si le coupable s'est dépêché de couvrir ses traces, il n'a peut-être pas eu le temps de se débarrasser de ses vêtements souillés. »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback asiente firmemente.{/n} «Si el autor del delito tenía prisa por cubrir sus huellas, probablemente no haya tenido tiempo de deshacerse de la ropa sucia».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback asiente firmemente.{/n} «Si el autor del delito tenía prisa por cubrir sus huellas, probablemente no haya tenido tiempo de deshacerse de la ropa sucia».

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックがはっきりとうなずく。{/n}「犯人が痕跡を急いで消そうとしていたとすれば、汚れた衣類を処分するだけの時間はなかったかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックがはっきりとうなずく。{/n}「犯人が痕跡を急いで消そうとしていたとすれば、汚れた衣類を処分するだけの時間はなかったかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克坚定地点了点头。{/n}“既然那个凶手这么急于掩盖痕迹，那很可能没时间处理沾满血迹的衣服。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克坚定地点了点头。{/n}“既然那个凶手这么急于掩盖痕迹，那很可能没时间处理沾满血迹的衣服。”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback, tereddütsüz bir şekilde başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Eğer ki fail, izlerini kapatmak için acele ettiyse lekeli kıyafetlerden kurtulma şansı bulamamış olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback nods firmly.{/n} "If the perpetrator was in a hurry to cover their tracks, they may not have had time to dispose of the soiled clothing."
